front.title: Privacy Ensured Cloud Conferencing - Use Case and Goals

abstract.t: The aim of this document is to describe the use case of privacy ensured cloud conferencing in a pervasive monitoring landscape and to point out goals for a solution mitigating the pervasive monitoring threat [RFC7258]. Virtualized cloud-based conferencing is happening and IETF should take action to make such services viable and trustworthy from a pervasive monitoring perspective.
